chapters.text: To the graduating class of 2025: As you step out from Om Shanti English Medium School, remember that education is not just about books, but about character. Shine bright!
The stage was our canvas. From the annual day dances to the back-bench drumming sessions, our rhythm was unique and unstoppable.

students.name: Aarav Patel
students.quote: Don't watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going. I'll miss the canteen samosas the most!

students.name: Diya Sharma
students.quote: Happiness can be found even in the darkest of times, if one only remembers to turn on the light.

students.name: Rohan Gupta
students.quote: I came, I saw, I forgot my homework. Thanks to OSEM for tolerating my jokes for 12 years!

students.name: Ananya Singh
students.quote: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams. OSEM, you were a dream come true.

students.name: Arjun Mehta
students.quote: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts.

students.name: Priya Verma
students.quote: Life is 10% what happens to you and 90% how you react to it. OSEM taught me resilience.

students.name: Kabir Khan
students.quote: In the middle of difficulty lies opportunity. Thank you OSEM for every challenge!

students.name: Ishita Joshi
students.quote: Be yourself; everyone else is already taken. OSEM gave me the confidence to be me.

students.name: Aditya Rao
students.quote: The only way to do great work is to love what you do. Thanks OSEM for showing me my passion!

students.name: Tanvi Desai
students.quote: Education is the passport to the future. OSEM stamped mine with excellence!

farewell.text: It's not a goodbye, it's a 'see you later'. As we toss our caps, we carry OSEM in our hearts forever. Here's to new beginnings!
